blocks.name: nanorxor
blocks.content: 'nand' is equivalent to the equivalence of inclusive and exclusive or. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nanorxor(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wb(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1)))
} = {
  bitri(wnan(w0, w1), wb(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
  df-nan(w0, w1)
  impbii(wn(wa(w0, w1)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1)))
  rbaibr(wn(wa(w0, w1)), wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1))
  sylbi(wb(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1)))))
  bibi2i(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))
  xor2(w0, w1)
  sylbir(wb(wo(w0, w1), wa(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1)))), wn(wa(w0, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1))))
  pm4.71(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
  ja(wo(w0, w1), wn(wa(w0, w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
  con3i(wo(w0, w1), wa(w0, w1))
  orcd(wa(w0, w1), w0, w1)
  simpl(w0, w1)
  id(wn(wa(w0, w1)))
}

blocks.name: undisjrab
blocks.content: Union of two disjoint restricted class abstractions; compare ~ unrab . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm undisjrab(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wceq(cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), emptycls), wceq(cun(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), crab(s0, c0, wxo(w0, w1))))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wceq(cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), emptycls), wceq(cun(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), crab(s0, c0, wxo(w0, w1))), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), emptycls), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), crab(s0, c0, wxo(w0, w1))))
  3bitri(wceq(crab(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)), emptycls), wceq(crab(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), crab(s0, c0, wxo(w0, w1))), wral(s0, c0, wn(wa(w0, w1))), wral(s0, c0, wb(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1))))
  rabeq0(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wn(wa(w0, w1)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1)))
  bitr3i(wn(wa(w0, w1)), wb(wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1)), wnan(w0, w1))
  df-nan(w0, w1)
  nanorxor(w0, w1)
  rabbi(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1), wxo(w0, w1))
  eqeq1i(cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), emptycls, crab(s0, c0, wa(w0, w1)))
  inrab(s0, c0, w0, w1)
  eqeq1i(cun(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), crab(s0, c0, wxo(w0, w1)), crab(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)))
  unrab(s0, c0, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: iso0
blocks.content: The empty set is an ` R , S ` isomorphism from the empty set to the empty set. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 24-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iso0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wiso(emptycls, c0, c1, emptycls, emptycls)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wiso(emptycls, c0, c1, emptycls, emptycls), wf1o(emptycls, emptycls, emptycls), wral(hs0, emptycls, wral(hs1, emptycls, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(emptycls, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(emptycls, cv(hs1)))))))
  f1o0()
  ral0(hs0, wral(hs1, emptycls, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(emptycls, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(emptycls, cv(hs1))))))
  df-isom(hs0, hs1, emptycls, c0, c1, emptycls, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iso0(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∅ ≅ c0, c1(∅, ∅))
} = {
  mpbir2an((∅ ≅ c0, c1(∅, ∅)), (∅ : ∅ ↔ ∅), ∀(hs0 ∈ ∅, ∀(hs1 ∈ ∅,(hs0[c0]hs1 ↔(∅ ` hs0)[c1](∅ ` hs1)))))
  f1o0()
  ral0(hs0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ∅,(hs0[c0]hs1 ↔(∅ ` hs0)[c1](∅ ` hs1))))
  df-isom(hs0, hs1, emptycls, c0, c1, emptycls, emptycls)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: ssrecnpr
blocks.content: ` RR ` is a subset of both ` RR ` and ` CC ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Nov-2015.)

blocks.name: seff
blocks.content: Let set ` S ` be the real or complex numbers. Then the exponential function restricted to ` S ` is a mapping from ` S ` to ` S ` . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 6-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm seff(class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cres(ce, c0), c0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpr(cr, cc)))
} = {
  3syl(w0, wf(cres(ce, c0), c0, c0), wcel(c0, cpr(cr, cc)), wo(wceq(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cc)))
  elpri(c0, cr, cc)
  jaoi(wceq(c0, cr), wceq(c0, cc), wf(cres(ce, c0), c0, c0))
  mpbird(wceq(c0, cr), wf(cres(ce, c0), c0, c0), wf(cres(ce, cr), c0, c0))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cr), wf(cres(ce, cr), c0, c0), wf(cres(ce, cr), cr, cr))
  mp2b(wf(cres(ce, cr), cr, cr), wf1(cres(ce, cr), cr, crp), wf(cres(ce, cr), cr, crp))
  reeff1()
  f1f(cres(ce, cr), cr, crp)
  mpan2(wf(cres(ce, cr), cr, crp), wf(cres(ce, cr), cr, cr), wss(crp, cr))
  rpssre()
  fss(cres(ce, cr), cr, crp, cr)
  anidms(wceq(c0, cr), wb(wf(cres(ce, cr), c0, c0), wf(cres(ce, cr), cr, cr)))
  feq23(c0, cr, c0, cr, cres(ce, cr))
  feq1d(cres(ce, c0), c0, c0, cres(ce, cr), wceq(c0, cr))
  reseq2(c0, cr, ce)
  mpbird(wceq(c0, cc), wf(cres(ce, c0), c0, c0), wf(cres(ce, cc), c0, c0))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cc), wf(cres(ce, cc), c0, c0), wf(cres(ce, cc), cc, cc))
  mpbi(wf(cres(ce, cc), cc, cc), wf(ce, cc, cc))
  feq1i(ce, cc, cc, cres(ce, cc))
  eqtr3i(ce, cres(ce, cc), cres(ce, cdm(ce)))
  mp2b(wceq(cres(ce, cdm(ce)), ce), wf(ce, cc, cc), wrel(ce))
  frel(ce, cc, cc)
  resdm(ce)
  reseq2i(ce, cdm(ce), cc)
  fdmi(ce, cc, cc)
  eff()
  anidms(wceq(c0, cc), wb(wf(cres(ce, cc), c0, c0), wf(cres(ce, cc), cc, cc)))
  feq23(c0, cc, c0, cc, cres(ce, cc))
  feq1d(cres(ce, c0), c0, c0, cres(ce, cc), wceq(c0, cc))
  reseq2(c0, cc, ce)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm seff(class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((exp |` c0): c0 → c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })
} = {
  3syl(w0, ((exp |` c0): c0 → c0), c0 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }, (c0 = ℝ ∨ c0 = ℂ))
  elpri(c0, cr, cc)
  jaoi(c0 = ℝ, c0 = ℂ, ((exp |` c0): c0 → c0))
  mpbird(c0 = ℝ, ((exp |` c0): c0 → c0), ((exp |` ℝ): c0 → c0))
  mpbiri(c0 = ℝ, ((exp |` ℝ): c0 → c0), ((exp |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ))
  mp2b(((exp |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ), ((exp |` ℝ): ℝ ↣ ℝ+), ((exp |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ+))
  reeff1()
  f1f((exp |` ℝ), cr, crp)
  mpan2(((exp |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ+), ((exp |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ), ℝ+ ⊆ ℝ)
  rpssre()
  fss((exp |` ℝ), cr, crp, cr)
  anidms(c0 = ℝ, (((exp |` ℝ): c0 → c0)↔((exp |` ℝ): ℝ → ℝ)))
  feq23(c0, cr, c0, cr, (exp |` ℝ))
  feq1d((exp |` c0), c0, c0, (exp |` ℝ), c0 = ℝ)
  reseq2(c0, cr, ce)
  mpbird(c0 = ℂ, ((exp |` c0): c0 → c0), ((exp |` ℂ): c0 → c0))
  mpbiri(c0 = ℂ, ((exp |` ℂ): c0 → c0), ((exp |` ℂ): ℂ → ℂ))
  mpbi(((exp |` ℂ): ℂ → ℂ), (exp : ℂ → ℂ))
  feq1i(ce, cc, cc, (exp |` ℂ))
  eqtr3i(ce, (exp |` ℂ), (exp |` dom(exp)))
  mp2b((exp |` dom(exp))= exp, (exp : ℂ → ℂ), Rel(exp))
  frel(ce, cc, cc)
  resdm(ce)
  reseq2i(ce, dom(exp), cc)
  fdmi(ce, cc, cc)
  eff()
  anidms(c0 = ℂ, (((exp |` ℂ): c0 → c0)↔((exp |` ℂ): ℂ → ℂ)))
  feq23(c0, cc, c0, cc, (exp |` ℂ))
  feq1d((exp |` c0), c0, c0, (exp |` ℂ), c0 = ℂ)
  reseq2(c0, cc, ce)
}

blocks.name: sblpnf
blocks.content: The infinity ball in the absolute value metric is just the whole space. ` S ` analogue of ~ blpnf . (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 8-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sblpnf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cbl, c2), cpnf), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
  -| wceq(c2, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)))
} = {
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cbl, c2), cpnf), c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)), wo(wceq(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cc)))
  elpri(c1, cr, cc)
  jaoi(wceq(c1, cr), wceq(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cfv(cmet, c1)))
  syl5eqel(c2, cfv(cmet, c1), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)), wceq(c1, cr))
  mpbiri(wceq(c1, cr), wcel(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)), cfv(cmet, cr)))
  remet(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)))
  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)))
  eleq12d(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cmet, c1), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cr, cr)), cfv(cmet, cr), wceq(c1, cr))
  reseq2d(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1), cxp(cr, cr), wceq(c1, cr))
  anidms(wceq(c1, cr), wceq(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(cr, cr)))
  xpeq12(c1, cr, c1, cr)
  fveq2(c1, cr, cmet)
  syl5eqel(c2, cfv(cmet, c1), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)), wceq(c1, cc))
  mpbiri(wceq(c1, cc), wcel(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc)), cfv(cmet, cc)))
  eqeltrri(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc)), cfv(cmet, cc), ccom(cabs, cmin))
  eqtr3i(ccom(cabs, cmin), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc)), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cdm(ccom(cabs, cmin))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cdm(ccom(cabs, cmin))), ccom(cabs, cmin)), wrel(ccom(cabs, cmin)))
  relco(cabs, cmin)
  resdm(ccom(cabs, cmin))
  reseq2i(ccom(cabs, cmin), cdm(ccom(cabs, cmin)), cxp(cc, cc))
  fdmi(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc), cc)
  mp2an(wf(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc), cc), wf(cabs, cc, cc), wf(cmin, cxp(cc, cc), cc))
  mp2an(wf(cabs, cc, cc), wf(cabs, cc, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  absf()
  ax-resscn()
  fss(cabs, cc, cr, cc)
  subf()
  fco(cabs, cc, cc, cmin, cxp(cc, cc))
  cnmet()
  eleq12d(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)), cfv(cmet, c1), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc)), cfv(cmet, cc), wceq(c1, cc))
  reseq2d(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1), cxp(cc, cc), wceq(c1, cc))
  anidms(wceq(c1, cc), wceq(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(cc, cc)))
  xpeq12(c1, cc, c1, cc)
  fveq2(c1, cc, cmet)
  blpnf(c2, c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sblpnf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→(c0[(ball ` c2)]+∞)= c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ })
  ⊣ c2 =((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))
} = {
  sylan(w0, c0 ∈ c1, (c0[(ball ` c2)]+∞)= c1, c2 ∈(Met ` c1))
  3syl(w0, c2 ∈(Met ` c1), c1 ∈ { ℝ, ℂ }, (c1 = ℝ ∨ c1 = ℂ))
  elpri(c1, cr, cc)
  jaoi(c1 = ℝ, c1 = ℂ, c2 ∈(Met ` c1))
  syl5eqel(c2, (Met ` c1), ((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1)), c1 = ℝ)
  mpbiri(c1 = ℝ, ((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))∈(Met ` c1), ((abs ∘ -)|`(ℝ × ℝ))∈(Met ` ℝ))
  remet(((abs ∘ -)|`(ℝ × ℝ)))
  eqid(((abs ∘ -)|`(ℝ × ℝ)))
  eleq12d(((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1)), (Met ` c1), ((abs ∘ -)|`(ℝ × ℝ)), (Met ` ℝ), c1 = ℝ)
  reseq2d((abs ∘ -), (c1 × c1), (ℝ × ℝ), c1 = ℝ)
  anidms(c1 = ℝ, (c1 × c1)=(ℝ × ℝ))
  xpeq12(c1, cr, c1, cr)
  fveq2(c1, cr, cmet)
  syl5eqel(c2, (Met ` c1), ((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1)), c1 = ℂ)
  mpbiri(c1 = ℂ, ((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))∈(Met ` c1), ((abs ∘ -)|`(ℂ × ℂ))∈(Met ` ℂ))
  eqeltrri(((abs ∘ -)|`(ℂ × ℂ)), (Met ` ℂ), (abs ∘ -))
  eqtr3i((abs ∘ -), ((abs ∘ -)|`(ℂ × ℂ)), ((abs ∘ -)|` dom((abs ∘ -))))
  ax-mp(((abs ∘ -)|` dom((abs ∘ -)))=(abs ∘ -), Rel((abs ∘ -)))
  relco(cabs, cmin)
  resdm((abs ∘ -))
  reseq2i((abs ∘ -), dom((abs ∘ -)), (ℂ × ℂ))
  fdmi((abs ∘ -), (ℂ × ℂ), cc)
  mp2an(((abs ∘ -):(ℂ × ℂ)→ ℂ), (abs : ℂ → ℂ), (- :(ℂ × ℂ)→ ℂ))
  mp2an((abs : ℂ → ℂ), (abs : ℂ → ℝ), ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  absf()
  ax-resscn()
  fss(cabs, cc, cr, cc)
  subf()
  fco(cabs, cc, cc, cmin, (ℂ × ℂ))
  cnmet()
  eleq12d(((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1)), (Met ` c1), ((abs ∘ -)|`(ℂ × ℂ)), (Met ` ℂ), c1 = ℂ)
  reseq2d((abs ∘ -), (c1 × c1), (ℂ × ℂ), c1 = ℂ)
  anidms(c1 = ℂ, (c1 × c1)=(ℂ × ℂ))
  xpeq12(c1, cc, c1, cc)
  fveq2(c1, cc, cmet)
  blpnf(c2, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: prmunb2
blocks.content: The primes are unbounded. This generalizes ~ prmunb to real ` A ` with ~ arch and ~ lttrd : every real is less than some positive integer, itself less than some prime. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm prmunb2(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cr), wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))), wrex(hs0, cn, wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))))
  reximddv2(hs0, s0, cn, cprime, wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))
  lttrd(c0, cv(s0), cv(hs0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))))
  simplll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))
  ad3antlr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  nnre(cv(hs0))
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  zred(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cprime))
  prmz(cv(s0))
  simprl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))
  simprr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cr), wrex(hs0, cn, wrex(s0, cprime, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cr), wrex(hs0, cn, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))), wral(hs0, cn, wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))))
  arch(hs0, c0)
  rgen(hs0, cn, wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))
  prmunb(s0, cv(hs0))
  r19.29r(hs0, cn, wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0))))
  rexbii(hs0, cn, wrex(s0, cprime, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))))
  r19.42v(s0, cprime, wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(s0)))
  mp2b(wb(wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))), wrex(hs0, cn, wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))), wcel(nat1, cn), wne(cn, emptycls))
  1nn()
  ne0i(nat1, cn)
  r19.9rzv(hs0, cn, wrex(s0, cprime, wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0))))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cr))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, clt, cv(hs0))
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
